content: this has always been my most requested hat pattern easy to crochet and sized to fit based on math this hat is perfect for multiple sizes and provides instructions for both mid-ear and base of earlobe lengths yarn red heart with love hook 5 50 mm i gauge 3 sts per inch / 2 75 rounds per inch i have had numerous requests for beanies using different yarn and hook combinations the first request is for a half_double_crochet beanie using worsted weight yarn specifically red heart with love with a 5 50 mm crochet hook the instructions below are for a mid-ear length beanie using this specific yarn and hook combination if you want this beanie to reach the base of your earlobe instead - the information you need to increase the length is included at the very end of the post have fun with your yarn rhondda
